The Penguin Classics map has many wonderful attributes worth emulating. 

```{r setup}
library(cortez)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```

The places visited by the collectors can be loaded using ``, and the route they took (which I made up) can be loaded via ``. 

```{r}

data(places)
```
